price: Envié antes de ti [otros Mensajeros] a los pueblos antiguos,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ فِي شِيَعِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā min qablika fī shiyaʿi al-awalīna
